title: Anderson Cooper | Colbert Classic
description:
Ahead of Father's Day last year, Anderson Cooper reflected on how the holiday has brought him closer to his son and his father, who passed away when Anderson was 10 years old. For more conversations on grief between Stephen and Anderson, check out Colbert's interview on Anderson Cooper's new podcast "All There Is," available wherever you get your podcasts.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
